search.list: function Main(html){if(html.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){var myArray=new Array();myArray.push(html);return myArray;};return jsoups(html,'#content > tr:gt(0)');}
search.title: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'#content > div > table > tbody > tr > td > table > tbody > tr > td > span > b');};return jsoup(text,'td:nth-child(1) > a');}
search.introduction: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'#content > div:nth-child(1) > table:nth-child(1) > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(4)');};return jsoup(text,'td:nth-child(5)');}
search.cover: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'#content > div > table > tbody > tr > td > img@attr->src');};return null;}

detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > div:nth-child(1) > table:nth-child(1) > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(2)');}

detail.catalog_url: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(6) > div > span:nth-child(1) > fieldset > div > a@attr->href');}
